_comment: English translations for Bash Cheat Code

bash.description: Bash shell scripting reference. From basics to advanced shell scripting in Linux/Unix environments.

変数.title: Variables

コメント.title: Comments
コメント.code:
# This is an inline Bash comment.

: '
This is a
very neat comment
in bash
'

引数.title: Arguments
引数.code:
# $1 … $9    - Parameter 1 ... 9
# $0         - Name of the script itself
# $1         - First argument
# ${10}      - Positional parameter 10
# $#         - Number of arguments
# $*        - All arguments
# $@         - All arguments, starting from first
# $-         - Current options
# $_         - Last argument of the previous command

条件分岐.title: Conditionals
条件分岐.code:
if [[ -z "$string" ]]; then
    echo "String is empty"
elif [[ -n "$string" ]]; then
    echo "String is not empty"
fi

コマンド置換.title: Command Substitution
コマンド置換.code:
# => I'm in /path/of/current
echo "I'm in $(PWD)"

# Same as:
echo "I'm in `pwd`"

接頭辞・接尾辞の削除.title: Prefix/Suffix Removal
接頭辞・接尾辞の削除.code:
STR="/path/to/foo.cpp"
echo ${STR%.cpp}    # /path/to/foo
echo ${STR%.cpp}.o  # /path/to/foo.o
echo ${STR%/*}      # /path/to

echo ${STR##*.}     # cpp (extension)
echo ${STR##*/}     # foo.cpp (basepath)

echo ${STR#*/}      # path/to/foo.cpp
echo ${STR##*/}     # foo.cpp

部分文字列.title: Substring
部分文字列.code:
name="John"
echo ${name}           # => John
echo ${name:0:2}       # => Jo
echo ${name::2}        # => Jo
echo ${name::-1}       # => Joh
echo ${name:(-1)}      # => n
echo ${name:(-2)}      # => hn
echo ${name:(-2):2}    # => hn

デフォルト値.title: Default Values
デフォルト値.description: Default value when variable is unset

大文字・小文字変換.title: Case Conversion
大文字・小文字変換.code:
STR="HELLO WORLD!"
echo ${STR,}   # => hELLO WORLD!
echo ${STR,,}  # => hello world!

STR="hello world!"
echo ${STR^}   # => Hello world!
echo ${STR^^} # => HELLO WORLD!

配列の定義.title: Array Definition
配列の定義.code:
Fruits=('Apple' 'Banana' 'Orange')

Fruits[0]="Apple"
Fruits[1]="Banana"
Fruits[2]="Orange"

ARRAY1=(foo{1..2}) # => foo1 foo2
ARRAY2=({A..D})    # => A B C D

配列のインデックス.title: Array Indexing
配列のインデックス.code:
Fruits=('Apple' 'Banana' 'Orange')

echo ${Fruits[0]}     # First element
echo ${Fruits[-1]}    # Last element
echo ${Fruits[@]}     # All elements
echo ${#Fruits[@]}    # Number of all
echo ${#Fruits}       # Length of 1st
echo ${Fruits[@]:3:2} # Range

配列の反復処理.title: Array Iteration
配列の反復処理.code:
Fruits=('Apple' 'Banana' 'Orange')

for e in "${Fruits[@]}"; do
    echo $e
done

インデックス付き反復処理.title: Indexed Iteration
インデックス付き反復処理.code:
for i in "${!Fruits[@]}"; do
  printf "%s\t%s\n" "$i" "${Fruits[$i]}"
done

配列操作.title: Array Operations
配列操作.code:
Fruits=("${Fruits[@]}" "Watermelon")     # Push
Fruits+=('Watermelon')                   # Also Push
Fruits=( ${Fruits[@]/Ap*/} )             # Remove by regex match
unset Fruits[2]                          # Remove one item
Fruits=("${Fruits[@]}")                  # Duplicate

連想配列の定義.title: Associative Array Definition
連想配列の定義.code:
declare -A sounds

sounds[dog]="bark"
sounds[cow]="moo"
sounds[bird]="tweet"
sounds[wolf]="howl"

連想配列の操作.title: Associative Array Operations
連想配列の操作.description: Getting values and keys from associative arrays
連想配列の操作.code:
echo ${sounds[dog]} # Dog's sound
echo ${sounds[@]}   # All values
echo ${!sounds[@]}  # All keys
echo ${#sounds[@]}  # Number of elements
unset sounds[dog]   # Delete dog

連想配列の反復処理.title: Associative Array Iteration
連想配列の反復処理.code:
for val in "${sounds[@]}"; do
    echo $val
done

for key in "${!sounds[@]}"; do
    echo $key
done

整数の比較.title: Integer Comparison
整数の比較.code:
[[ $a -eq $b ]]  # Equal
[[ $a -ne $b ]]  # Not equal
[[ $a -lt $b ]]  # Less than
[[ $a -le $b ]]  # Less or equal
[[ $a -gt $b ]]  # Greater than
[[ $a -ge $b ]]  # Greater or equal

文字列の比較.title: String Comparison
文字列の比較.code:
[[ $a == $b ]]   # Equal
[[ $a != $b ]]   # Not equal
[[ -z $a ]]       # Is empty
[[ -n $a ]]       # Is not empty
[[ $a < $b ]]     # Less than (lexicographically)
[[ $a > $b ]]     # Greater than (lexicographically)

ファイル条件.title: File Conditions
ファイル条件.code:
[[ -e $file ]]    # Exists
[[ -r $file ]]    # Readable
[[ -h $file ]]    # Symlink
[[ -d $file ]]    # Directory
[[ -w $file ]]    # Writable
[[ -s $file ]]    # Size is > 0 bytes
[[ -f $file ]]    # File
[[ -x $file ]]    # Executable

論理演算子.title: Logical Operators
論理演算子.code:
[[ $a && $b ]]   # Logical AND
[[ $a || $b ]]   # Logical OR
[[ ! $a ]]        # Logical NOT

Forループ.title: For Loop
Forループ.code:
for i in /etc/rc.*; do
  echo $i
done

Cスタイルforループ.title: C-style For Loop
Cスタイルforループ.code:
for ((i = 0 ; i < 100 ; i++)); do
  echo $i
done

範囲forループ.title: Range For Loop
範囲forループ.code:
for i in {1..5}; do
    echo "Welcome $i times"
done

Untilループ.title: Until Loop
Untilループ.description: Until loop (runs while condition is false)

BreakとContinue.title: Break and Continue
BreakとContinue.code:
for i in {1..10}; do
    if [[ $i -eq 5 ]]; then
        break
    fi
    echo $i
done

戻り値.title: Return Values
戻り値.code:
myfunc() {
    return 1
}

if myfunc; then
    echo "success"
else
    echo "failure"
fi

Bashオプション.title: Bash Options
Bashオプション.code:
# Avoid overlay files
set -o noclobber

# Used to exit upon error
set -o errexit

# Unveils hidden failures
set -o pipefail

# Exposes unset variables
set -o nounset

グロブオプション.title: Glob Options
グロブオプション.code:
# Non-matching globs are removed
shopt -s nullglob

# Non-matching globs throw errors
shopt -s failglob

# Case insensitive globs
shopt -s nocaseglob

# Wildcards match dotfiles
shopt -s dotglob

# Allow ** for recursive matches
shopt -s globstar

履歴コマンド.title: History Commands
履歴コマンド.code:
history              # Show history
sudo !!             # Run the previous command with sudo
shopt -s histverify # Don't execute expanded result immediately

履歴展開.title: History Expansion
履歴展開.code:
!!                 # Execute last command again
!!:s/<FROM>/<TO>/  # Replace first occurrence
!!:gs/<FROM>/<TO>/ # Replace all occurrences
!$                 # Last parameter of most recent command
!-n                # Expand nth most recent command

サブシェル.title: Subshell
サブシェル.code:
(cd somedir; echo "I'm now in $PWD")
pwd # still in first directory

リダイレクション.title: Redirection
リダイレクション.code:
python hello.py > output.txt   # stdout to (file)
python hello.py >> output.txt  # stdout to (file), append
python hello.py 2> error.log   # stderr to (file)
python hello.py 2>&1           # stderr to stdout
python hello.py 2>/dev/null    # stderr to (null)
python hello.py &>/dev/null    # stdout and stderr to (null)

python hello.py < foo.txt      # feed foo.txt to stdin

Case/Switch.title: Case/Switch
Case/Switch.code:
case "$1" in
    start | up)
    vagrant up
    ;;

    *)
    echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop|ssh}"
    ;;
esac

printf.title: printf
printf.code:
printf "Hello %s, I'm %s" Sven Olga
#=> "Hello Sven, I'm Olga"

printf "1 + 1 = %d" 2
#=> "1 + 1 = 2"

printf "Print a float: %f" 2
#=> "Print a float: 2.000000"

オプション解析.title: Option Parsing
オプション解析.code:
while [[ "$1" =~ ^- && ! "$1" == "--" ]]; do case $1 in
    -V | --version )
    echo $version
    exit
    ;;
    -s | --string )
    shift; string=$1
    ;;
    -f | --flag )
    flag=1
    ;;
esac; shift; done

条件実行.title: Conditional Execution
条件実行.code:
git commit && git push
git commit || echo "Commit failed"
